green_development.title: Web Eco-Design Best Practices
green_development.description: With the support of over 40 contributors from the responsible digital design collective, GreenIT.fr has developed a reference guide of 115 web eco-design best practices.

functional_frugality.title: Functional Frugality Guidelines
functional_frugality.description: GR491 is the Responsible Digital Services Design Reference Guide created by the French Responsible Digital Institute.

tech_ecodesign.title: Tech Eco-Design Guidelines
tech_ecodesign.description: GR491 is the Responsible Digital Services Design Reference Guide created by the French Responsible Digital Institute.
